text: Bryan Greenberg (born May 24, 1978) is an American actor and singer. He played Ben Epstein in the HBO original series How to Make It in America, Jake Jagielski in the WB series One Tree Hill and as Nick Garrett on the short- lived ABC drama October Road. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Jewish American actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Omaha, Nebraska Category:Singers from Omaha, Nebraska Category:Actors from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Singers from St. Louis, Missouri
title: Bryan Greenberg
